text: In .\bin\catalina, there is a reference to .\bin\setenv.bat.  I am unable to successfully run .\bin\startup.bat because of this missing file.  I confirmed that it is missing from the .ZIP file that I downloaded from http://apache.mirror99.com/tomcat/tomcat-6/v6.0.16/bin/apache-tomcat-6.0.16.zip
creator: drew_smith70@yahoo.com
markt@apache.org
text:
The line in catalina.bat is:
if exist "%CATALINA_BASE%\bin\setenv.bat" call "%CATALINA_BASE%\bin\setenv.bat"

If the file doesn't exist, and it doesn't by default (this is intentional), then it won't get called.

You have something else wrong with your installation or you have been editing the batch files.

The users list id the correct place to seek help with this issue.
